original_text: John knew what they were thinking. He said to them, ‘I baptize you with water. But someone else is coming soon. He is much greater than I am. I am not good enough even to undo his shoes for him. This other person will baptize you with the Holy Spirit and with fire.
korean_text: 요한이 모든 사람에게 대답하여 이르되 나는 물로 너희에게 세례를 베풀거니와 나보다 능력이 많으신 이가 오시나니 나는 그의 신발끈을 풀기도 감당하지 못하겠노라 그는 성령과 불로 너희에게 세례를 베푸실 것이요

sentences.original_text: John knew what they were thinking.
sentences.korean_translation: 요한은 그들이 무엇을 생각하고 있는지 알고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: But someone else is coming soon.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 사람이 곧 올 것이다.

sentences.original_text: He is much greater than I am.
even to undo his shoes for him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 신발 끈을 풀 자격조차 없다.

sentences.original_text: This other person will baptize you
sentences.korean_translation: 이 다른 사람은 너희에게 세례를 줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: with the Holy Spirit and with fire.
